title: Lake living! Rent on the water!
posting_body: ['1 bedroom 1 bath apartment available now at the Riviera Apartments!', 'Located on Lakeshore Blvd, our apartments are nesteled right on Lake Erie, close to shopping, restaurants and activities.', 'Included amenties:', '-new vinyl flooring', '-new carpet', '-locked lobby', '-fitness gym', '-outside parking and garage parking available', '-washer and dryers located in the building', '-water is a flat rate, All electric, no gas bill', 'Please contact Jess at', 'show contact info', 'for more details or to schedule your private tour.', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by Elon Property Management, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
